newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan gets no bids for federal bonds.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan gets no bids for federal bonds.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan said it had received no bids invited for Monday for the auction of three-year, five-year and 10-year maturity federal investment bonds.

In the previous auction on March 20, the bank accepted bids worth 20 million rupees at par for three-year maturity bonds, four million rupees at par for five- year bonds and 55 million rupees at par for 10-year maturity bonds.
